channel.title: Players can't connect. [ DETAILED - Please look!] REP++!
channel.description:
Okay so i'm running my 317 DELTA Server [u]off of my laptop[/u] (for now) using Verizon Internet.
I have a ProLine DSL Modem given to my by Verizon. It is not a wireless router. It is Ethernet only.
I hooked a NETGEAR router up so I can connect my laptop wirelessly.
192.168.1.1 takes me to my modem. In my modem settings I have the ports set to be forwarded to my router.
Then 10.0.0.1 takes me to my router. In my router settings I have the correct ports forwarded to my laptops IP.
I posted my server on the Server Status Page and it got accepted and is now posted. But, players still can't log on weather it be using MoparScape Client, or my OleanPkz Client.
Idk if it's a connection problem, or it's a problem with my client but I will rep++ and give you credit in my server.
CLIENT DL: http://www.megaupload.com/?d=ZG0OGXXZ
(Look over the files. Let me know!) GUI is set to IP: OleanPk.no-ip.org
Thanks!

item.title: Players can't connect. [ DETAILED - Please look!] REP++!
item.dc:creator: @JGX JGX
item.description:
@JGX wrote:

Aerocrash:

How long have you used your no-ip account. Sometimes no-ip.com will suspend your host name happened to me a few times. Login to your no-ip account and renew your host information. You connection is fine, and your ports sound like they are forwarded correctly. :rolleyes:

The problem was resolved. It was a error in my GUI and client.java (client sided)

But thanks anyways!

Read full topic
item.source: Players can't connect. [ DETAILED - Please look!] REP++!
